step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, maintaining an upright posture.
Nicely done raising your hands. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your head as you bring them up.
Great job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and not pulling forward.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Smooth return. Ensure your wrists stay aligned as you bring your hands back to your lap.
Second rep starting well. Keep your hands clasped and posture tall.
Good lift. Continue to focus on keeping elbows close to your head as you raise your hands.
Excellent spread! Keep your head upright and avoid any forward pulling motion.
Holding strong. Maintain an upright head position and avoid pulling forward.
Well done completing the second rep. Ensure your wrists remain aligned during the return motion.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to maintain an upright posture and avoid pulling forward to maximize the stretch.
